text:
The Top Five South African Night Clubs On Fleek The Top Five South African Night Clubs On Fleek 0 
The urban nightlife in South Africa is as hot as it has ever been, and it shows no signs of slowing down. Below are five of the top South African nightclubs that everyone needs to visit at least once in their life. It's party time, y'all! 
Kong 
Located in Rosebank, Johannesburg, Kong is renowned for having the most gangsta parties in South Africa and has recently played host to international celebrities like Floyd Mayweather, Nas and D'Banj. Plan a night out with the guys on a Friday or Saturday evening, depending on your music tastes. Friday nights are dedicated to fresh urban beats, whereas Saturday night is perfect for electro and dance music fans. Prepare for a party to remember! 
The Shimmy Beach Club 
Party on the beach all night long at the infamous Shimmy Beach Club, located at the V&A Waterfront in Cape Town. The music is awesome and the atmosphere is always 'on fleek'. It is the place to be on those hot summer evenings - just don't forget your trusty antiperspirant deodorant. After all of that jolling and excitement, you're definitely going to need it! 
The Origin 
Known for hosting some of the best parties in South Africa, The Origin nightclub in Durban is a must for all party animals from around the country. There are various 'zones' within the club, all of which play different types of music - from deep house to intense dance tunes. Whatever your preference, you are sure to get your 'boogie' on all night long! 
Taboo 
One of Sandton, Johannesburg's, best known and loved nightclubs, Taboo is an essential part of local urban nightlife. Local celebrities often make appearances here, so if you are looking to 'get down' with the elite whilst enjoying some epic tunes and a drink or two, this is certainly the place to be. Don't forget to check out Luxe Taboo - the club's infamous hip hop dance floor - and show off some of your best moves! 
The VIP Room 
It is becoming evident that Sandton is the party capital of Gauteng. The VIP Room is another popular hot spot ideal for those with sophisticated tastes. The glamorous atmosphere and classy setup of this nightclub has solidified its reputation and is the reason why world class artists from far and wide are drawn here. 
Taking advantage of the very best South African nightclubs and events has never been more straightforward. So, be sure to dress to the nines, use a reliable antiperspirant deodorant and leave your mark wherever you choose to go. It's time to let loose, bro!
